text: Doug O'Dell was a retired Major general in the United States Marine Corps, notable for being appointed as the head of the Office of the Federal Coordinator for Gulf Coast Rebuilding by President Bush. ==Early life== He grew up in Pottstown, PA and attended The Hill School and Rutgers University.http://www.dailylocal.com/article/DL/20020310/TMP01/303109977 Upon graduation from Rutgers in 1968, he was commissioned through the Platoon Leaders Class. During his career in the United States Marine Corps Reserves, he pursued a civilian career in investment management, and retired in 2001https://georgewbush- whitehouse.archives.gov/news/releases/2008/04/20080418-4.html == References == Category:The Hill School alumni Category:Rutgers University alumni
title: Doug O'Dell
